name: Scaler*
description:
[Note that the current build is after 72 hours of development, intended for the MashUp Game Jam]

Scaler* is a 3D Puzzle/Shooter. Use your Sizey Gun* to change the size of objects in your environment. Shrink and grow yourself to fit into small spaces.

*we may change these names in the future.

Known Bugs:

  • There are some areas where you can clip through the map by changing size.
  • The pause menu may not open on some browsers.
  • The cursor may not be centered, resulting in the crosshair being an inaccurate representation of where shots are fired.
  • Restarting the level may make cubes unable to be picked up.

Planned Features:

  • Proper tutorial level with voice-over instructions and subtitles.
  • Redesigning or possibly scrapping current level.
  • Adding additional levels.
  • Optimizing code.
  • New graphics.
  • Additional audio cues.
